name: @ideal-postcodes/api-typings
description: Typings and other useful javascript abstractions for interacting with the Ideal-Postcodes.co.uk API

scripts.test: npm run lint && NODE_ENV=test node_modules/.bin/mocha --opts mocha.opts
scripts.docs: ./node_modules/.bin/typedoc --mode file --target ES3 --out docs/ --name 'Ideal Postcodes API Typings' --includeDeclarations --theme minimal --excludePrivate --hideGenerator --excludeExternals lib/

author: Ideal Postcodes
